mapper.select: /* selectAdminMemberById [관리자 회원 아이디 중복 체크 쿼리] */ SELECT "MNGR_ID" FROM "MNGR_MBR_INFO_TB" WHERE "MNGR_ID" = #{searchId}

/* selectAdminMemberByNo [관리자 회원 상세조회 쿼리] */ SELECT a."MNGR_NO", a."MNGR_ID", d."DEPT_NM", a."MNGR_TELNO", a."MNGR_MBL_TELNO", a."MNGR_EML", a."MNGR_NM", a."DEPT_NO" FROM "DEPT_INFO_TB" d RIGHT JOIN "MNGR_MBR_INFO_TB" a ON a."DEPT_NO" = d."DEPT_NO" WHERE a."MNGR_NO" = #{no}
